entries: ✍️ New feature: Users can propose and vote for new features.
✨ Improvement: show snack bar message when opening a link in the browser.
✨ Improvement: Link to report app bugs.
🐛 Bug fixed: start minimized.
🛎️ Improvements: Do not reinitialize the tray icon when no needed.
↔️ Improvements: Spacing and layout in some dialogs.
🐛 Bug fixed: Close update installer file when downloaded.
🐛 Bug fixed: Properly get app update information.
✨ Improvements: better design for the initial database data. Avoided using a large-size external file.
✨ Improvements: new change log JSON structure with more information
🗒️ Show te complete change log in the update dialog
✨ Improvements: enhanced support for window positioning, sizing, window icons, and system tray icons
📅 Feature: Middle-click on system tray icon toggles app visibility (show/hide)
✨ Improvement: Better support for server-side header bars in KDE
🐛 Bug Fixes: Fixed issues with the menu tag dialog and improved saving/restoring of window size and position
📅 Feature: Added a setting to choose between date picker or calendar for date selection
✨ Improvements: Redesigned dialogs, smoother menu animations, fixed text flickering, and implemented saving/restoring of window size and position
🐛 Bug Fixes: Fixed task description not refreshing correctly, accounted for column visibility and position in sorting, and resolved various minor issues
↔️ Feature: resizable table columns
✨ Improvement: Automatically select newly created tasks
✨ Improvement: Automatically select the next or previous task after deleting one
📊 Feature: Show the number of currently selected tasks in the task table
📄 Feature: Added a licenses page
🐛 Bug fix: Table without focus always jumped to the first row, even when clicking another row
🐛 Bug fix: Prevented overflow issues in some dialogs
✨ New feature: Configure column order and toggle visibility in the task table
💾 New feature: Added support for saving and restoring database backups
🐛 Bug fix: Improved keyboard navigation using up/down arrows, and refined tab order between components
🌍 Bug fix: Added missing localizations for several text elements
🚀 Improved user experience: cell date, highlight divider, description icon, removed flickering
⬆️ Updated several package dependencies
🗂️ Added database indexes to improve sorting performance
🐛 Fixed: rows now sort correctly by start or due date and hour
🐛 Fixed: tray icon menu now rebuilds only when necessary; also resolved a visual glitch
🐛 Fixed: resolved an issue with the show/hide option in the tray icon menu
🐛 Fixed a bug where tasks with null dates were not consistently ordered at the bottom of the table
🔄 Bug fixed in automatic update checks
🐛 Fixed handling of command-line arguments
✨ Added option to start the app minimized
🛎️ Enhanced and updated the system tray menu
🔄 Added automatic update checks at startup and regular intervals
🔤 Corrected various naming and spelling errors
🔄 Added auto-update support on Linux (AppImage)
🛠️ Many bug fixes and general improvements
✨ Added dark mode support
🐛 Fixed crash on launch when no internet connection
🚀 Improved startup time by 40%
🔧 Updated dependencies to latest stable versions
✍️ New feature: Users can propose and vote for new features.
✨ Improvement: show snack bar message when opening a link in the browser.
✨ Improvement: Link to report app bugs.
🐛 Bug fixed: start minimized.
🛎️ Improvements: Do not reinitialize the tray icon when no needed.
↔️ Improvements: Spacing and layout in some dialogs.
🐛 Bug fixed: Close update installer file when downloaded.
🐛 Bug fixed: Properly get app update information.
✨ Improvements: better design for the initial database data. Avoided using a large-size external file.
✨ Improvements: new change log JSON structure with more information
🗒️ Show te complete change log in the update dialog
✍️ New feature: Users can propose and vote for new features.
✨ Improvement: show snack bar message when opening a link in the browser.
✨ Improvement: Link to report app bugs.
